testcase.name: ApplicationController .create() should create a book in the database
ApplicationController .create() should try to create a book in the database with wrong format
ApplicationController .read() should find a book in the database by id
ApplicationController .read() should cannot find a book in the database as id does not exist
ApplicationController .readName() should find a book in the database by name

testcase.name: ApplicationController .readName() should cannot find a book in the database as name which does not exist
ApplicationController .update() should find a book in the database by id and update the fields
ApplicationController .update() should try update a book by an id that does not exist and non conforming body format
ApplicationController .updateField() should update one string field finding book by id
ApplicationController .updateField() should update one Int field finding book by id
ApplicationController .updateField() should try update a book by an id that does not exist and non conforming body format
ApplicationController .delete() should find a book in the database by id and delete
ApplicationController .delete() should cannot find a book in the database as id and cannot delete
